Module org.eclipse.persistence.json
Package org.eclipse.persistence.json

Class JsonTypeConverter

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.persistence.json.JsonTypeConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, CoreConverter<DatabaseMapping,Session>, Converter
public class JsonTypeConverter extends Object implements Converter
Default JSON field value to JDBC data type converter.
